page.title: 11Education in Chorley (1)
page.content: Within the map reference area there are fourteen primary schools,five secondary schools (now referred to as High Schools) one very small private school two nursery schools (these are attached to primary schools) and one remedial reading centre. The fourteen primary schools are made up of one infant school with pupils in the age range 4 to 7, one Junior school with pupils in the age range 7 to 11 and twelve joint infant and junior schools catering for pupils within the age range 4 to 11. The High schools cater for pupils within the age range 11 to 16. On transfer to 6th.form colleges the pupils have to travel to either Preston or Leyland.
